Articles.Content: Hello, I haven't played this game for a while and recently decided to get back into it. I had an old science mode world that I played in before so decided to play in that save. I played a brief travel to Minimus and came back and wanted to recover the science points I had earned. When I pressed Recover Vessel, my vessel was taken and no GUI screen appeared telling me that I got any science points and I didn't receive any science points. Furthermore, whenever I recover a vessel now, all of my Kerbals are transferred to the Lost category of the recruitment area. I have tried the same thing again and nothing changes, I also tried recovering a different vessel in a different area but the same problem occurs. Also, I dont have any mods installed and my current OS is windows 7.
Start a new game. Recent changes were big enough to be save-braking.
